description: Make every day feel like your best day on the trails. PULSAR TRAIL features our soft and springy Energy Surge midsole for lively response and fluid, smooth transitions, coupled with Energy Blade for propulsion. A higher stack height brings added comfort underfoot.
name: Salomon Pulsar Trail - Mens

specs.value: If you're between two sizes, go for the larger one as this item is close fitting
Lightweight, responsive foam created by combining EVA and Olefin [OBC] to deliver long-lasting cushion and bouncy energy return
Materials made from recycled products such as PET bottles or material waste
Energy Blade is a light TPU plate built into the midsole. The joined efforts of blade, midsole foam and sole geometry activates forward propulsion and ensures stability on trails
An internal fit sleeve designed to hug the foot in exactly the right places and provide a precise fit
Minimalistic and strong lace for one-pull tightening. Easy-on, easy-off
